author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:

Tentative impementation of per-thread MF volume cache as suggested by @VinInn in the discussion of #28180 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28180#issuecomment-618174565), intended to allow further testing.

#### PR validation:

Regression-tested for identical values against reference files for all maps/currents/eras.

Also verified this in a multithread job spanning across multiple IOVs to verify that the cache gets invalidated when necessary as expected.
title: Tentative implementation of TLS cache for MF
